member.name: D3D12_RT_FORMAT_ARRAY
member.summary: Wraps an array of render target formats.

member.name: D3D12_RT_FORMAT_ARRAY.RTFormats
member.summary: Specifies a fixed-size array of DXGI_FORMAT values that define the format of up to 8 render targets.

member.name: D3D12_RT_FORMAT_ARRAY.NumRenderTargets
member.summary: Specifies the number of render target formats stored in the array.
